summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CardioCoach Adaptive Training Guidance feature. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly with full EN/FR language support.
passed_tests: POST /api/coach/guidance generates adaptive guidance in English
POST /api/coach/guidance generates adaptive guidance in French
Navigation includes Guidance link with proper test IDs
Guidance page loads with proper title and subtitle
Status displayed with appropriate icon and color (HOLD STEADY)
Guidance includes max 3 suggested sessions with rationale
Refresh button generates new guidance successfully
No medical language detected in guidance
Training summary included in guidance response
Session structure includes type, duration, intensity, and 'why now' rationale
Disclaimer displayed correctly ('Guidance only - not a fixed plan')
